alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:58AM MST until January 02 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional accumulation of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will continue across the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
